title: Bug 121170 - 'getColumnLabel' method does not return recognizable strings before data extraction
description: The current implementation of the 'getColumnLabel' method in the 'IMetaData' interface does not return recognizable strings before data extraction.
OB: When calling the 'getColumnLabel' method before data extraction, the labels returned are null.
EB: The expected behavior is that the 'getColumnLabel' method should return recognizable strings before data extraction.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Initialize the 'IMetaData' object.
2. Call the 'getColumnLabel' method before any data extraction operations.
3. Observe that the returned labels are null.
